This yearly event, known as the Walk for Kidneys, is organized by the National Kidney Foundation of Illinois (NKFI) to raise awareness and funds for kidney disease research, education, and patient support. For Dialysis Care Center and Kidney Care Center, it’s more than just a walk – it’s a tradition built on love, remembrance, and the drive to make a difference.Why We WalkTeam Care has participated in the Kidney Walk since 2018.
